title: Kerry Katona, 39, displays the results of her visage after getting painful jaw and lip fillers
text:
Kerry Katona has shown off her brand new look after getting fillers in her chin and jaw.

The former Atomic Kitten star, 39, looked happier than ever as she arrived to Tulley's Shocktober Fest Scream Park press night at Tulley's Farm, Sussex, just a few days after sharing a video of herself getting fillers.

Arriving on Thursday to the horror event with her new beau Ryan Mahoney and four of her kids, the songstress oozed confidence as she flaunted the results of the painful injections full of filler.

Kerry Katona, 39, has shown off her brand new look after getting fillers in her chin and jaw as she arrived to Tulley's Shocktober Fest Scream Park press night at Tulley's Farm, Susses

Makeover: Kerry, L, appeared thrilled at the results of her new look. R- The star is pictured at the event at the end of September

Days earlier, Kerry shared a video of herself getting filler injections in the comfort of her own home.

She added a caption: 'So today I had the beautiful ladies from @harleycosmeticlondon come and enhance my natural beauty.

'Now I know half of you are gonna have a go and say something like me being a role model blah blah but I honestly don’t think this is any different to heavy make up if it’s done properly!!

'I’m 40 next year and just had a full M.O.T on me face!!! And I’m loving the results.. thank you ladies,' she concluded.

Days earlier: Kerry shared a video of herself getting filler injections in the comfort of her own home

In the zone: Kerry appeared to be anticipating the pain as she closed her eyes while the injections were administered

'Had a full M.O.T on my face': Kerry added a thrilled caption the photos in which she stated she didn't care about any 'role model' backlash because she was 'loving the results'

Meanwhile, Kerry wrapped up against the autumn chill in a black padded coat and a classic Burberry scarf as she joined several famous faces at the Halloween themed event.

In keeping with her cosy look, Kerry teamed her coat and scarf with wet look black leggings and embellished boots.

Finishing off her look, she added a black baker boy cap and a bold red cross-body bag.

While her attire was casual for the occasion, the TV star injected some glam into her look with a layer of shimmering make-up, while her blonde tresses were brushed into a sleek style.

Kerry appeared in high spirits at the event as she cosied up to her beloved children (bar eldest daughter Molly) at the fun-filled event.

Sweet: Kerry was wrapped up against the autumn chill in a black padded coat and a classic Burberry scarf as she cosied up to her beau Ryan Mahoney and four of her kids

And proving that their relationship is going from strength-to-strength, her boyfriend Ryan was right among the fold as he clutched on to Kerry's youngest child Dylan-Jorge.

Kerry has daughters, Molly, 17, and Lilly-Sue, 16, with first husband Brian McFadden, Heidi, 12, and Maxwell, 11, with second spouse Mark Croft and Dylan-Jorge, five, with late third husband George.

Kerry's outing comes after confirmed she had reunited with her personal trainer former beau Ryan Mahoney in her column for new! magazine in September.

She branded the hunk a 'godsend' as he supports her following the death of her ex-husband George Kay.

So close: proving that their relationship is going from strength-to-strength, her boyfriend Ryan was right among the fold as he clutched on to Kerry's youngest child Dylan-Jorge

Looking good: Finishing off her look, she added a black baker boy cap and a bold red cross-body bag

She said: 'He's been a good friend to me and over the last few months we just decided to give it a go.

'He's been a godsend recently when I've needed him most. We're settled, committed, my kids love him and so do I.'

The star added she and Ryan are hoping to keep their relationship out of the spotlight, after a string of relationships ended after she spoke too openly about them.

She said: 'In my mind, the definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over and expecting a different result. So this time I'm finally dating a man who has a job, his own money, and is very happy to stay out of the media.'
description: Kerry Katona, 39, has shown off her brand new look after getting fillers in her chin and jaw as she arrived to Tulley's Shocktober Fest Scream Park press night at Tulley's Farm, Sussex
